duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute sales strategies to drive revenue and promote high-quality industrial and manufacturing products.
Build and maintain strong relationships with distributors and end-users, identifying their needs and providing suitable product solutions.
Effectively present and market industrial products and tools, showcasing their quality and benefits to potential clients.
Travel as needed to engage with clients and conduct sales activities, both inside and outside sales.
Utilize CRM tools to manage pipeline and customer relationships, while leveraging G-Suite for efficient communication and collaboration.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred, Associate's degree may be considered
